name: Puffy Pigeon [Kickstarter Demo]
description:
Please note that this game is a demo accompanying a Kickstarter campaign to turn it into a full fledged experience. If you are interested in supporting us, please check the link below!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/minimgames/puffy-pigeon

PLEASE NOTE - A Mac-compatible version of the demo is in the works and will be released soon!

Puffy Pigeon is a fast-paced arcade-like game featuring our titular hapless hero, Puffy the Pigeon!

Guide our fat feathered friend through stages filled with dangerous hazards, aggressive enemies and sweet collectibles, keeping him out of harm's way as he is blustered from place to place.

Gameplay Features:

  • Multiple stages with many new hazards and obstacles each level
  • Each stage comes with a boss to test your skills
  • Normal mode or a hard mode designed for masochists - your choice!
  • No microtransactions - Play the game without worrying about waiting on lives or purchasing level buffs!

Puffy is cute, fluffy and ... uhm, not very bright. Prone to eating anything and everything that he can swallow, it is bound to get him in trouble one day...

...Today is that day.

Finding a mysterious glowing device, he does what he does best and eats it - only to immediately find himself fat, bloated and soaring into the skies against his will.

He's not the only one with his eye on the Device, however, and soon attracts the attention of the Beaked Bandits, a quintet of bird baddies who will stop at nothing to get it from him!

And so it up to you to guide Puffy past hazards and foes (gathering all those delicious berryfruits on the way!) until he makes it to the end of his big adventure... wherever that may be.
